snippet.title: Cellyon: Boss Confrontation Trailer (PC)
snippet.description:
The first trailer of Cellyon: Boss Confrontation is finally available!
Cellyon: Boss confrontation is an indie multiplayer boss fighting game, coming on Early Access on Steam in october the 1st 2020. 
You and your three companions are Inurnim's last hope. Test your tactical sense and reflexes in ruthless battles against bosses in MMORPG-like instances.

Full details on our Steam page !:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/802120/Cellyon_Boss_Confrontation/

Follow us on our social networks to avoid missing any news on Cellyon: Boss Confrontation.
Twitter: https://twitter.com/sentryGamesTM
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SentryGames/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playcellyon/
Join the community on Discord: https://discord.gg/sentrygames
